Game information:

From the creator of a series of quests Gabriel Knight,
Jane Jensen. We are waiting for the metaphysical sci-fi
thriller, the plot of which inspired the TV series Fringe
and the already mentioned series of Gabriel Knight. The main
hero of the game was made antiquarian named Malaki Rector,
hired some character named Amber Dexter to investigate the
murder of a certain woman in Venice.

The game will have two modes - Casual Adventure and True Adventure.
In the first mode, the game will be accompanied by hints, in the
second, everything will be severe, as in this classic "adventure game" 90.


Repack Features:

Moebius: Empire Rising
Includes Update 4
and crack text from ZoG Forum Team
Cut Credits
Do not recoded
